creditline: Gift of Dr. and Mrs. Frederick Baekeland
description: flat oval base; unglazed on bottom; dull gold vertical stripes with turquoise spots separated by turquoise and dark blue lines; top is dark blue with small turquoise spots; irregular turquoise horizontal bands break up designs
inscription:
Inscription and Sticker

on bottom, in black: untranslated inscription
title: (Oval vase)
